name: Salmon Quinoa Nourish Bowl
description: Here’s a game-changing secret: preparing quinoa in the microwave! It’s a time-saver that beats the stovetop method. Make sure to add your favourite seasoning (we love using SPG Seasoning) while it cooks, infusing the quinoa with extra flavour. This is an ideal meal to prep ahead and take on-the-go.

ingredients.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette or Sesame Ginger Dressing
low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Combine quinoa, water and seasoning in a Multipurpose Steamer. Microwave with lid on for 12 minutes. Set aside.
Arrange quinoa, salmon, and remaining vegetables amongst four bowls. Drizzle each with vinaigrette. Serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!
